content: व्यावृत्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Turned a way from, withdrawn from; व्यावृत्ता यत्परस्वेभ्यः श्रुतौ तस्करता स्थिता <ls>R. 1. 27</ls>; <ls>V. 1. 8.</ls> {@--2@} Separated from, singled out. {@--3@} ({%a%}) Excluded, set aside; different from; अयमर्थोऽस्माद् व्यावृत्तः <ls>Tarka K.</ls> ({%b%}) Not being found or existing in, absent from (frequently used in <ab>phil.</ab> in this sense); धूमो जलहदादेर्व्यावृत्तः <ls>Tarka K.</ls>; <ls>Mu. 5. 10.</ls> {@--4@} Revolved, turned round. {@--5@} Encompassed, surrounded. {@--6@} Desisting, ceased from; <ls>Ku. 2. 35.</ls> {@--7@} Split asunder.
